name: R5-MedicationDispenseStatusCodes-R4-MedicationDispenseStatusCodes
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MedicationDispenseStatusCodes into FHIR R4

element.display: The dispensed product was not and will never be picked up by the patient.

target.display: The dispensed product was not and will never be picked up by the patient.

element.display: The dispensed product has been picked up.

target.display: The dispensed product has been picked up.

element.display: The dispense was declined and not performed.

target.display: The dispense was declined and not performed.

element.display: The dispense was entered in error and therefore nullified.

target.display: The dispense was entered in error and therefore nullified.

element.display: The dispensed product is ready for pickup.

target.display: The dispensed product is ready for pickup.

element.display: The dispense process is paused while waiting for an external event to reactivate the dispense.  For example, new stock has arrived or the prescriber has called.

target.display: The dispense process is paused while waiting for an external event to reactivate the dispense.  For example, new stock has arrived or the prescriber has called.

element.display: The core event has not started yet, but some staging activities have begun (e.g. initial compounding or packaging of medication). Preparation stages may be tracked for billing purposes.

target.display: The core event has not started yet, but some staging activities have begun (e.g. initial compounding or packaging of medication). Preparation stages may be tracked for billing purposes.

element.display: Actions implied by the dispense have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.

target.display: Actions implied by the dispense have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.

element.display: The authoring system does not know which of the status values applies for this medication dispense.  Note: this concept is not to be used for other - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, it's just now known which one.

target.display: The authoring system does not know which of the status values applies for this medication dispense.  Note: this concept is not to be used for other - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, it's just now known which one.
